summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FVS System (Brain + Orchestrator) feature. Backend: 21/21 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features working correctly. FVS System page renders with all required components. Automation level changes work. Run Brain Now generates ideas via LLM. Produce/Reject buttons work. Created submissions and assets appear on respective pages.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/fvs/config requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/fvs/ideas requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/fvs/brain-snapshot requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/fvs/activity requires auth (401)
Backend: POST /api/fvs/propose-ideas requires auth (401)
Backend: POST /api/fvs/produce-episode requires auth (401)
Backend: GET /api/fvs/config returns automation config
Backend: PUT /api/fvs/config can set automation to manual
Backend: PUT /api/fvs/config can set automation to semi_auto
Backend: PUT /api/fvs/config can set automation to full_auto_short
Backend: PUT /api/fvs/config rejects invalid automation level (400)
Backend: GET /api/fvs/brain-snapshot returns latest snapshot
Backend: GET /api/fvs/ideas returns list of ideas
Backend: GET /api/fvs/ideas?status=proposed filters by status
Backend: GET /api/fvs/activity returns activity log
Backend: POST /api/fvs/propose-ideas generates ideas with LLM
Backend: POST /api/fvs/produce-episode creates submission and assets
Backend: POST /api/fvs/produce-episode with invalid idea returns 404
Backend: PATCH /api/fvs/ideas/{id}/status can reject an idea
Backend: FVS submissions appear in /api/submissions
Backend: FVS assets appear in /api/assets
Frontend: Login as client (alex@company.com / client123) works
Frontend: FVS System nav link in sidebar works
Frontend: FVS System page renders with data-testid='fvs-system-page'
Frontend: Automation Level card present with 3 options
Frontend: Brain Snapshot card shows learned patterns
Frontend: Episode Ideas table shows ideas with columns
Frontend: Activity Log card shows recent FVS operations
Frontend: Run Brain Now button triggers idea generation
Frontend: Automation level change shows toast notification
Frontend: Produce button triggers episode production
Frontend: Reject button updates idea status to rejected
Frontend: Created submission appears on /dashboard/submissions
Frontend: Created assets appear on /dashboard/assets
seed_data_creation: Created multiple FVS ideas and produced episodes during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: FVS System is fully functional. Backend endpoints: /api/fvs/config, /api/fvs/brain-snapshot, /api/fvs/ideas, /api/fvs/activity, /api/fvs/propose-ideas, /api/fvs/produce-episode. Frontend page at /dashboard/system with test-ids: fvs-system-page, automation-card, brain-snapshot-card, idea-queue-card, activity-log-card, run-brain-btn, produce-btn-{id}, reject-btn-{id}. LLM calls use real emergentintegrations library. Video/Audio/Thumbnail generation is MOCKED.

mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - Kling provider returns sample video URL
mocked_integrations.audio_generation: MOCKED - ElevenLabs returns placeholder audio URL
mocked_integrations.thumbnail_generation: MOCKED - DALL-E returns placeholder image URL
mocked_integrations.llm_providers: NOT MOCKED - Real LLM calls via emergentintegrations (Gemini, Anthropic)
